document.full_text: if jo-jo reyes does not beat the yankees on wednesday, he will join matt keough of the 1978-79 oakland athletics as the only pitchers since 1923 to make 28 consecutive starts without a victory.
document.title: on baseball: hapless but not hopeless, blue jays' reyes carries on
lines_and_colors: if jo-jo reyes does not beat the yankees on wednesday, he will join matt keough of the 1978-79 oakland athletics as the only pitchers since 1923 to make 28 consecutive starts without a victory.
